2052.subject: BUS
2052.descrlong: Electronic Commerce has emerged as a crucial channel allowing a business to expand markets; offer instant service; and forge close links with customers, partners, and vendors. This course provides essentials of developing and managing an electronic commerce initiative. Students gain hands-on experience using the hardware, software, and applications in establishing and developing an e-commerce site. Focuses on learning various technology and design issues, and building a prototype of an e-commerce site. (Offered only as interest warrants.)
